    • Method Detail

      • registerDataRequestSync

        @POST
 @Path(value="/registerDataRequest")
public DataRequestResponse registerDataRequestSync(RegisterDataRequest request)

      • registerDataRequest

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<DataRequestResponse> registerDataRequest(RegisterDataRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: PalisadeService
        This method is used by the client code to register that they want to read a resource or data set. This method will check that the user can have access to the resource and pass back details of all the resources linked to the initial request (if they asked for a data set) and how to connect to the relevant data service to get that data. Then behind the scenes this will have triggered more services to be called to collate the data required by the getDataRequestConfig() method so the data service can apply the relevant policies.
        Specified by:
        registerDataRequest in interface PalisadeService
        Parameters:
        request - a RegisterDataRequest that contains the details the client needs to provide the palisade service for it to register the data request
        Returns:
        details of all the resources linked to the initial request (if they asked for a data set) and how to connect to the relevant data service to get that data.

      • getDataRequestConfigSync

        @POST
 @Path(value="/getDataRequestConfig")
public DataRequestConfig getDataRequestConfigSync(GetDataRequestConfig request)

      • getDataRequestConfig

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<DataRequestConfig> getDataRequestConfig(GetDataRequestConfig request)
        Description copied from interface: PalisadeService
        This method is used by the data service's to request the trusted details that it requires to apply the necessary data access controls.
        Specified by:
        getDataRequestConfig in interface PalisadeService
        Parameters:
        request - This is the GetDataRequestConfig that the client passed to the data service.
        Returns:
        a DataRequestConfig containing the information that the data service requires to apply the necessary filtering/transformations to the data.
